title: INfinance
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Does my friend have a right to her late father’s multimillion-dollar real-estate empire? His widow claims they’re mired in debt.
items.description: “My friend really wanted to keep her father’s condo, but her mother sold that too — and it broke her heart.”

items.title: ‘It’s expensive feeding and housing a family of 7’: I’m 41 with $46K in credit-card debt. Do I raid my $1.2 million IRAs?
items.description: “I bring in $7,200 a month from my pension and disability benefits.”

items.title: Why has Invesco’s QQQ called me two dozen times in the past few weeks? Is it a scam?
items.description: Invesco’s QQQ postponed its proxy vote again, so the calls will keep coming

items.title: Here’s how the best investors protect their money from market bubbles and FOMO
items.description: Managing risk and avoiding ‘volatility drag’ is absolutely critical to achieving long-term financial goals.

items.title: My friend cosigned a loan for a BMW, but the driver defaulted. They’re both on the hook for $5K. What happens now?
items.description: “The driver thinks he should be compensated $1,500 for the tires he’s still paying for.”

items.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
items.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

items.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
items.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

items.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
items.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
